thread.title: Bangladesh's July inflation rises on non-food prices -planning minister
thread.title_full: Bangladesh's July inflation rises on non-food prices -planning minister | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Bangladesh's July inflation rises on non-food prices -planning minister
text:
DHAKA Aug 4 Bangladesh's annual inflation picked up in July for a second straight month, the country's planning minister said on Tuesday, led by a rise in non-food prices.
Consumer prices in July rose 6.36 percent from a year earlier, accelerating from 6.25 percent in June, Mustafa Kamal told reporters. (Reporting by Ruma Paul; Editing by Himani Sarkar)
